com.hp.jipp.pdl

Class RenderablePage

  • com.hp.jipp.pdl.RenderablePage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PwgReader.PwgPage

    public class RenderablePage

    A page whose contents can be rendered to an IntArray of pixels.

    See Also:
    IntArray

    • Field Detail

      • WHITE_BYTE

        public static byte WHITE_BYTE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Companion

        public static com.hp.jipp.pdl.RenderablePage.Companion Companion

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderablePage

        public RenderablePage(int widthPixels,
                      int heightPixels)

        A page whose contents can be rendered to an IntArray of pixels.

        Parameters:
        widthPixels - Width of the entire page, in pixels.
        heightPixels - Height of the entire page, in pixels.
        See Also:
        IntArray

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(int yOffset,
                   int swathHeight,
                   @NotNull
                   ColorSpace colorSpace,
                   @NotNull
                   kotlin.Array[] byteArray)

        Render a full-width swath of the page into an array of bytes at the given DPI.

        Parameters:
        yOffset - yOffset from top of page, in pixels.
        swathHeight - height of swath to be rendered, in pixels.
        colorSpace - Color Space defining how each pixel is to be encoded.
        byteArray - A ByteArray having the correct size available for this swath (see renderSize).

      • renderSize

        public int renderSize(int swathHeight,
                      @NotNull
                      ColorSpace colorSpace)

        Return the number of bytes which must be present in the byteArray supplied to render. The value is calculated according to the following formula:

        widthPixels * colorSpace . ColorSpace.bytesPerPixel * swathHeight

        See Also:
        render, colorSpace, swathHeight

      • rotated

        @NotNull
public RenderablePage rotated()

        Return a version of this page, but rotated 180 degrees.

      • flipY

        @NotNull
public RenderablePage flipY()

        Return a version of this page, but flipped top-to-bottom.

      • flipX

        @NotNull
public RenderablePage flipX()

        Return a version of this page, but flipped left-to-right.

      • blank

        @NotNull
public RenderablePage blank()

        Return a blank version of this page (same width/height but all pixels white).

      • getWidthPixels

        public int getWidthPixels()

        Width of the entire page,

        in pixels.

      • getHeightPixels

        public int getHeightPixels()

        Height of the entire page,

        in pixels.
